ingredients.ingredient: 1 (7 ounce) can chipotle peppers in adobo sauce
1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese (such as Philadelphia®), softened
3 pounds large shrimp, peeled and deveined

cookingTips: Blend chipotles with cream cheese and milk until smooth for a silky sauce
Cook shrimp just until pink; overcooking makes them tough
Taste and adjust spice level by adding more chipotle or cooling with extra milk as needed
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the cook through making a spicy chipotle cream sauce and cooking shrimp to perfect tenderness.
